Class PDFOutline

    • Method Detail

      • AddChild

        public Boolean AddChild(String^ label, int dest, float y)
        Add a child node to current outline node
        Parameters:
        label - The text label of this outline node
        dest - The page index of this outline node
        y - Shift in vertical direction of this outline node
        Returns:
        True if successed, otherwise false

      • AddNext

        public Boolean AddNext(String^ label, int dest, float y)
        Add a node next to current outline node
        Parameters:
        label - The text label of this outline node
        dest - The page index of this outline node
        y - Shift in vertical direction of this outline node
        Returns:
        True if successed, otherwise false

      • GetChild

        public PDFOutline GetChild()
        Get first Child node of current outline node
        Parameters:
         
        Returns:
        A PDFOutline instance refer to the child node, NULL if there is not any child node

      • GetNext

        public void GetNext()
        Get first next node of current outline node
        Parameters:
        Returns:
        A PDFOutline instance refer to next node, NULL if current node is the last one

      • RemoveFromDoc

        public Boolean RemoveFromDoc()
        Remove outline data from PDF document
        Parameters:
        Returns:
        True if successed, otherwise false
